SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: WOs_Awaiting_Warehousing
SQLDataSource.Where:
wo_no IN (SELECT wo_no FROM (SELECT a.task_seq, a.wo_no, a.maint_material_order_no, a.line_item_no, a.is_closed, &AO.Active_Separate_API.Get_Reg_Date(a.wo_no) as reg_date, &AO.Maint_Material_Req_Line_API.Get_Plan_Qty(a.maint_material_order_no, a.line_item_no) as plan_qty, &AO.Maint_Material_Req_Line_API.Get_Qty_Assigned(a.maint_material_order_no, a.line_item_no) as qty_assigned FROM &AO.maint_material_req_line_uiv a
WHERE &AO.Maint_Material_Requisition_API.Transport_Task_Exist(a.wo_no, a.maint_material_order_no, a.task_seq, a.line_item_no) = 'FALSE'
AND (plan_qty > qty_assigned OR (plan_qty = qty_assigned AND a.task_seq IN (SELECT c.task_seq FROM &AO.jt_execution_instance_uiv c WHERE c.task_seq = a.task_seq AND &AO.Jt_Execution_Instance_API.Get_State(a.task_seq, c.execution_instance_seq) = 'Assigned'))) AND a.is_closed = 0 AND &AO.Sc_Service_Contract_API.Get_Contract_Type(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(task_seq)) = 'MS') WHERE &AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_State(task_seq) = 'Released' AND reg_date >= TO_DATE(NVL('$BEGIN_DATE$', '01/01/1900'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND reg_date <= TO_DATE(NVL('$END_DATE$', '31/12/2999') || ' 11:59:59 PM', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss pm') AND REPLACE(NVL(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(task_seq), ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$CONTRACT_ID$', ' '), ' ', '%')
AND REPLACE(NVL(&AO.Crm_Cust_Info_API.Get_Main_Representative_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Customer_No(task_seq)), ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$REGION_REPRESENTATIVE$', ' '), ' ', '%'))
